title: Trying to install custom announcer file problems
body: I tried installing a imaqtipie voice announcer pack into my client, but every time I install it when I try starting a game the client crashes and I need to repair my files. Is there any way to get the imaqtipie announcer pack working for me. This is also a problem with custom skins where after using it a few times my client crashes and I have to repair my client.

replies.body:
We don't support third party modifications or programs currently. Doing so would be at your own risk, and we wouldn't be able to provide any support if you run into any issues with the game or client.  Unknown sources might contain hidden or malicious content that could get your account into trouble. 

I recommend using our [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752674-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs) to run a fresh install on your client, and stick to the normal features.  Our stance on third parties can be found [here](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/miscellaneous/5kx4F7VE-reminder-third-party-applications). I hope that helps clear some things up!
